      • hasTestResultFiles

        public boolean hasTestResultFiles()
        Description copied from interface: TestRule
        Returns a boolean indicating whether the files that contain the test results for this rule are present.

        If this method returns true, then TestRule.interpretTestResults(ExecutionContext, boolean) should be able to be called directly.

        Specified by:
        hasTestResultFiles in interface TestRule

      • interpretTestResults

      • runTests

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<Step> runTests(ExecutionContext executionContext,
                                                              TestRunningOptions options,
                                                              TestRule.TestReportingCallback testReportingCallback)
        Description copied from interface: TestRule
        Returns the commands required to run the tests.

        Note: This method may be run without BuildEngine.build(BuildEngineBuildContext, ExecutionContext, BuildRule) having been run. This happens if the user has built [and ran] the test previously and then re-runs it using the --debug flag.

        Specified by:
        runTests in interface TestRule
        Parameters:
        executionContext - Provides context for creating Steps.
        options - The runtime testing options.
        Returns:
        the commands required to run the tests

      • runTestSeparately

        public boolean runTestSeparately()
        Specified by:
        runTestSeparately in interface TestRule
        Returns:
        true if the test should run by itself when no other tests are run, false otherwise.

      • supportsStreamingTests

        public boolean supportsStreamingTests()
        Specified by:
        supportsStreamingTests in interface TestRule
        Returns:
        true if calling runTests() on this rule invokes the callbacks in testReportingCallback as the tests run, false otherwise.
